name: Jack and Sara: Educational game
description: In an unobtrusive way, Jack and Sara will teach your child fun games for the development of logic, attention, memory and color perception.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel / AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Directx compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 161 MB available space
